items.title: ‘An argument ensued’: My mother entrusted my inheritance to her second husband. That’s when it all went horribly wrong.
items.description: “He is a managing director at a major bank and probably clears $800,000 per annum.”

items.title: My boyfriend owns a house and earns more than me, but I still want a prenup. Is that wise?
items.description: “I recently learned about land that has been in my family for 150 years.”

items.title: ‘I’m very cynical’: My stepmother, 85, makes bizarre requests for money from my father’s $10M trust. Should I be concerned?
items.description: “He used a crappy lawyer to set up a very boilerplate trust agreement.”

items.title: ‘Real Housewives’ star Bethenny Frankel says she’s moving to Florida, but keeping her N.Y. properties
items.description: Frankel, a New York City native, says she is leaving the Big Apple behind and moving to Florida for her “personal and professional” growth.

items.title: Rachel McAdams lists her L.A. home for $4 million—is she staying in the South for good?
items.description: McAdams relocated her family to the South in order to escape the chaos of city life, and is selling her longtime Los Angeles home.
